about_the_game:
what Kind Of Game Is This?


DongBeiZhiXia (a summer in the northeast of China)is a free visual novel, which tells the story that the protagonist followed parents' wishes to make one's living in Shenyang, met two online anchors Huniu and Daojiang by chance, and experience affairs one after another with Shamate.

What are the highlights of this work?



During preparatory stage, I selected CVs suitable for each role from more than 20 CVs registered

Among them, there are some veteran voice actors who have been in their career for more than ten years, and there are also some interns in the dubbing studio.

And some of the voice actors are native northeasterners of China.

Most of the backgrounds images in the game were illustrated according to the landscape of Shenyang.

Compared with the previous video version, the game includes additional scenes, CG, and enhanced visual effects.

More stories behind the scenes about the game can be searched in Bilibili
detailed_description:
what Kind Of Game Is This?


DongBeiZhiXia (a summer in the northeast of China)is a free visual novel, which tells the story that the protagonist followed parents' wishes to make one's living in Shenyang, met two online anchors Huniu and Daojiang by chance, and experience affairs one after another with Shamate.

What are the highlights of this work?



During preparatory stage, I selected CVs suitable for each role from more than 20 CVs registered

Among them, there are some veteran voice actors who have been in their career for more than ten years, and there are also some interns in the dubbing studio.

And some of the voice actors are native northeasterners of China.

Most of the backgrounds images in the game were illustrated according to the landscape of Shenyang.

Compared with the previous video version, the game includes additional scenes, CG, and enhanced visual effects.

More stories behind the scenes about the game can be searched in Bilibili
legal_notice:
All materials are original, applied or purchased by Zhuang Buchun Studio. Some of the materials are free public materials.
Please do not install or use this software before reading and accepting all the terms of the EULA.
name: 东北之夏

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5 2430M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD 3000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3 8100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:

short_description: DongBeiZhiXia (a summer in the northeast of China)is a free visual novel, which tells the story that the protagonist followed parents' wishes to make one's living in Shenyang, met two online anchors Huniu and Daojiang by chance, and experience affairs one after another with Shamate.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
